Title: The Devil You Know
Plot: A daring prison escape puts Raylan on the trail of two old foes. Meanwhile, Boyd confronts a traitor in his inner circle.
ParentalRatingReason: M Violence,offensive language,drug use and sexual references
GuestStars: Mykelti Williamson, Jeremy Davies, Adam Bartley, Ed Corbin, Clayne Crawford, Kaitlyn Dever, Demetrius Grosse, Damon Herriman, David Meunier, Kevin Rankin, Todd Stashwick, Neal McDonough
